review: Just one phrase is enough to describe Dr Marwah - ** ** *** ******** **** ** *** needs to undergo gynaecology related surgery. We visited him for my wife's problems of endometriosis and fibroids after consulting several doctors in Delhi and NCR. By that time, we knew that hysterectomy was the only option for her as she was living with extreme pain. But even in that critical stage, Dr Marwah reassured us and even managed to save one ovary during the surgery. What's more, my wife recovered quite fast, considering the stories we had heard about slow and painful recovery of hysterectomy patients. We only wish we had known about Dr Marwah earlier, maybe hysterectomy won't have been needed at all ...

review: More than a decade back in 2006 (29th Dec'2006), while we were living in New Delhi, called the referral line & my 1st visit to Sir Gangaram Hospital, I was so glad to have found such a friendly Dr. in Vivek Marwah who explained everything thoroughly & takes the time to answer any ?‚Äôs. I needed a procedure (lap. hysterectomy) done which I didn‚Äôt want to be done by Dr‚Äôs around me & that is why I went to Dr. Vivek. I fondly remember the sense of belongingness and I feel great  that within a day of the procedure, he made me walk and then started walking 2 miles a day in less than a month later. I trust him with my life and in return he's made quality of life so much better for me. Thank you Sir!

Dr. Vivek Marwah suggested removal of uterus by laparoscopy  due to fibroids in my uterus.  He explained the procedure to me and cleared all of my doubts.  I  went through the procedure. My recovery was fast and i could return to my normal life within 2 months Thanks to dr .Marwah 's expertise.

I am so happy that I went to Dr. Marwah for my uterine fibroid problem, ** ** *** **** *** *** *** ***** *** *********** He explained us the situation its effects and treatment so well. I underwent the laparoscopic surgery by him. The best part is that he is a gynaecologist also so he understand your doubts and issues very well. Unlike other doctors he give you his number so whenever you have some problem you can even contact him telephonically.
I am thankful to him for treating me and getting me rid of fibroid.
Don't have any doubt for him if you are going to consult him, he will take care of you very well.

He is possibly the best surgeon in the world. It was such an amazing experience to be treated by him and his wonderful team. His explanation was clear and detailed, the procedure was done extremely well that my recovery was very fast, after care was excellent. You felt that you were in safe hands and stress- free. I just wish I had gone to Dr Marwah sooner so I need not have suffered all these years.

*** **** ******* ****** *** **** **** ****** ** *** ************* ******* He has records of removing humongous big uterine fibroids and ovarian cyst via minimally invasive surgery. Empathetic doctor, such high level of expertise and yet so polite and down to earth.

His words have soothing power.
